entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
